p: Due to these risks of certain phthalates to health, in March 2012, the CDER published a guide to orient the pharmaceutical industry on the use of phthalates: “Limiting the use of certain phthalates as excipients in CDER regulated products”. This guidance document recommends limiting the use of certain phthalates, such as dibutyl phthalate (DBP) and di(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP) [ 28].
